item.description:
Kayak/canoe East Brimfield Lake in Sturbridge. Meet at 9:00 at Long Pond boat ramp.

To get there -

From the Mass Pike to Rt. 20 West - Stay on Rt. 20 through the center of Sturbridge. About 1/2 mile after the intersection of Rt. 20 and 148 (stay on Rt. 20), there will be a brown sign saying "East Brimfield Dam", and then shortly after that is another brown sign with a picture of a boat ramp, the entrance to the ramp area is on the right shortly after the ramp sign. When you get down to the parking lot, the sign says "Long Pond / East Brimfield Lake".

From Rt. 20 East - Go over the lake, and the entrance to the boat ramp is the first left after you go over the lake. The entrance is directly across the street from G&F Industries.
item.name: East Brimfield Lake, Sunday June 10
